data.title: afyon kocatepe university - Afyon Kocatepe Üniversitesi
data.meta_description: afyon kocatepe university - Afyon Kocatepe Üniversitesi
data.text: AFYON KOCATEPE UNIVERSITY SCHOOL OF TOURISM AND HOSPITALITY MANAGEMENT GENERAL INTRODUCTION School of Tourism and Hospitality Management, one of the graduate schools that has been delivering education at bachelor's degree under the roof of Afyon Kocatepe University, was founded on 11/11/2005 by decree of the Council of Ministers with the departments of “Hospitality Management”, “Travel Management”, “Food and Beverage Management” and “Department of Tourism Guidance”. The graduate school, whose education period is 5 years including 1 year of prep class, started its instruction with the department of “Hospitality Management” with 41 students in education term of 2007-2008. 6 instructors, 3 Assisting Professors and 3 research associates, and 3 administrative staff are employed under this school. School of Tourism and Hospitality Management has been delivering education in education building no. 5 on Ahmet Necdet Sezer Campus. There are 18 classrooms including 1 computer lab. The computer lab has internet-accessed 40 computers with package programs about Tourism and Hospitality Management. Tourism and Hospitality Program Center of Training And Practice is used for the purpose of practice by our students. The center has 14 rooms, including 3 suite rooms, and various social areas such as accommodation unit with 35 beds, restaurant for 400 persons, breakfast lounge for 40 persons, 1 bar and 1 playground. MISSION OF SCHOOL OF TOURISM AND HOSPITALITY MANAGEMENT Our mission is to better the position that tourism sector of our country holds within international competition under the light of scientific principles, to educate students to have high values of humanity and critical thought, to increase competitive power of our country in tourism sector, to contribute scientifically to both national and international tourism market and to serve the nation. VISION OF SCHOOL OF TOURISM AND HOSPITALITY MANAGEMENT Our vision is; to be a school which has both national and international accreditation, produces information at a high added value, directs economic, social and cultural development of the region and provides qualified human resource of which tourism sector is in need.
